00055 typedef struct rt_buffer {
00056 
00057         unsigned magic;   /* !< Magic code - must be first */
00058 
00059         xnsynch_t isynch_base;  /* !< Base synchronization object -- input side. */
00060         xnsynch_t osynch_base;  /* !< Base synchronization object -- output side. */
00061         xnhandle_t handle;      /* !< Handle in registry -- zero if unregistered. */
00062         char name[XNOBJECT_NAME_LEN]; /* !< Symbolic name. */
00063 
00064         int mode;               /* !< Creation mode. */
00065         int rptr;               /* !< Read pointer. */
00066         int wptr;               /* !< Write pointer. */
00067         size_t fillsz;          /* !< Filled space. */
00068 
00069         size_t bufsz;           /* !< Buffer size. */
00070         void *bufmem;           /* !< Buffer space. */
00071 
00072 #ifdef CONFIG_XENO_OPT_PERVASIVE
00073         pid_t cpid;                     /* !< Creator's pid. */
00074 #endif /* CONFIG_XENO_OPT_PERVASIVE */
00075         xnholder_t rlink;               /* !< Link in resource queue. */
00076 #define rlink2buffer(ln)        container_of(ln, RT_BUFFER, rlink)
00077         xnqueue_t *rqueue;              /* !< Backpointer to resource queue. */
00078 
00079 } RT_BUFFER;
